contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Yasaka'''|弥栄村|Yasaka-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Naka District, Shimane|Naka District]], [[Shimane Prefecture|Shimane]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2005 Yasaka, along with the towns of [[Asahi, Shimane|Asahi]], [[Kanagi, Shimane|Kanagi]] and [[Misumi, Shimane|Misumi]], all from [[Naka District, Shimane|Naka District]], was merged into the expanded city of [[Hamada, Shimane|Hamada]]. As of 2003, the village had an estimated [[population]] of 1,718 and a [[population density|density]] of 16.28 persons per km². The total area was 105.50 km². [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Shimane Prefecture]] {{Shimane-geo-stub}}
